agricultural_service_text: We offer chemical crop protection, harvesting (and preparatory service), sowing, plowing, grain drying and transport.
bulk_material_transport_service_text: We transport grain, corn and other bulk material
calc_select_atleast_one_location: Select at least one suitable location
calc_select_product: Select a product, to calculate the price
car_repair_service_text: We offer car repair and maintenance services
job_vacancies_NA_text: No job offers at the moment
job_offer_info: The workplace is located in Järvamaa. For additional info call +372 502 4530 or send an email to agri[at]speq.ee
landscaping_service_text: We offer the service of mowing the roadsides (and general mowing) and trimming.
machinery_text: List of machinery that we use.
maintenance_service: Maintenance and repair of heavy machinery
maintenance_service_text: We perform maintenance and repair work on machinery - from construction and forestry machines to trucks, buses, trailers and other heavy machinery.
motto: We offer many different services from landscaping, snow removal and excavation to winding and many more
position_filled: Just missed it, the job offer got filled.
proficiency_est: proficiency in Estonian at the level of communication
recycled_asphalt_service_text: We sell and transport milled asphalt. Suitable for driveways, parking lots and filling potholes.
rental_service_text: We rent out portable toilets and multilift containers.
septic_tank_service_text: We sell and set up bio-cleaners and septics.
sponsor_heading_1: The construction of Tammeküla repair hall
sponsor_message_1: The purpose of the repair hall was to create a business environment that takes into account today's needs, modern fields of work and flexible working methods, that provides more jobs close to home and bigger employment of the inhabitants.
sponsor_heading_2: The acquisition of tools for Tammeküla repair hall
sponsor_message_2: In 2021, a compressor and a welding machine were acquired, with the help of which better opportunities have been created for the maintenance and preservation of equipment and for the further development of the company.
telehandler_service_text: Most of the jobs of a crane, forklift, loader and bulldozer can be replaced with a multifunctional telehandler.
thankyou_forletter: Thanks for contacting us! We will get back to you soon!
transport_service_text: We offer logging, multilift and platform trailer service; also material and construction waste transport along with sand, gravel, dirt transport and sale.
winding_service_text: We offer waste water and sewage purging and transport with a Renault Midlum tanker, which holds 6m³ of waste water.
your_message_notification_html: In case of questions, problems or price request, call +372 452 2002, send an email to agri[at]speq.ee or send a message through the following form.
